meanings: [명사] consolation, comfort, [동사] console, comfort, (기운을 북돋우다) (slng) cheer sb up

vlive.korean: 우리 드림캐쳐랑 인썸니아만의 위로를 건넬 때 이렇게 하는 건 어때요? How about doing this when we're comforting each other and InSomnia? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: How about doing this when we're comforting each other and InSomnia?

vlive.korean: 파란색을 머리 위로 들어주세요! please hold up the blue color! 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?
vlive.english: please hold up the blue color!

vlive.korean: 뭔가 위로되는 곡을 보내야 되나? Should we play a song that's comforting? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [엑시 설아] 엑떨의 우쥬크박스🎧 Ep.10
vlive.english: Should we play a song that's comforting?

vlive.korean: '엄마가 아픈데 어떻게 위로를 하죠?' "My mom is sick. How should I comfort her?" 듣기 View video ITZY : 류진이의 왓어원더풀나잇💙
vlive.english: "My mom is sick. How should I comfort her?"

vlive.korean: 옆에만 있어줘도 위로가 될걸요? I think staying next to her will be comforting? 듣기 View video ITZY : 류진이의 왓어원더풀나잇💙
vlive.english: I think staying next to her will be comforting?
